formatted_address: S-45-01, Pusat Komersil Visi Medini (Versis Medini), Persiaran Medini 2, Bandar Medini Iskandar 79250 Iskandar Puteri, 79250 Johor Bahru, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Kumon Versis Medini

reviews.text: I am a student and Kumon has really helped improve my math and reading skills. The daily practice and supportive instructors make a big difference. Highly recommend the place. Thank you to all the Teachers!
New and clean area. It’s on the ground floor so it’s convenient for parents. There’s even a kopitiam right infront of the centre for parents to wait. Friendly teachers :)

vicinity: S-45-01, Pusat Komersil Visi Medini (Versis Medini), Persiaran Medini 2, Bandar Medini Iskandar 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Bahru
